item.title: UbuCon Korea 2024
item.description: Following the success of last year’s UbuCon Korea, UbuCon Korea was held at Aug 10th at Microsoft Korea. With the theme “Deploy with Ubuntu”

item.title: Ubuntu 24.04 LTS
item.description: Meet the latest Ubuntu LTS today: Better performance and developer productivity, New management toold for Desktop and WSL, Up to 12 years of support.
